roleset.name: to examine or analyze, to take apart for examination or analysis
roleset.note: DISSECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dissect' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from dissect.01-v predicate notes)
DISSECTION-N NOTES: Corresponds with dissect.01 (from dissection.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He-1 fusses endlessly over economic statistics , [*-1] dissecting them in dozens of ways , [*-1]probing for hours in search of potential problems .

example.name: Both args
example.text: The class' dissection of frogs went awry when Elliot released them all.
